DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare conventional diode 808 nm laser-assisted technique direct pulp cap permanent teeth .The present study base series ten clinical study pulp exposure cause carious lesions.The hypothesis paper laser support direct pulp cap-ping proven effectiveness capacity stimulate reparative dentine formation pulp cell , de-contamination ability irradiate area , ability fast well haemostatic , pain reduction .
